message: All metadata fields for the indicator 7-a-1, translated into en
data: Objective 7. Guarantee access for all to reliable, sustainable and modern energy services at an affordable cost7.a By 2030, strengthen international cooperation to facilitate access to clean energy science and technology, including renewable energies, energy efficiency and new clean combustion technologies for fossil fuels, and encourage investment in energy infrastructure and clean energy technologies7.a.1 International financial flows to developing countries in support of research and development in the field of clean energies and the production of renewable energy, in particular by means of hybrid systemsNot available
